document_data.name: One With the Land
document_data.mainbody: '''''One with the land''''' was a [[spell]] commonly used by [[druid]]s, [[hathran]]s and [[ranger]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed the caster to have a greater perceptiveness with nature. It increased the caster's ability in empathy with animals, hiding and stealthy movement, searching and increased directional awareness, wilderness lore and handling animals.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
